mainDescription: Welcome to my personal online portfolio. I'm Christian, a passionate Front-end developer with 1 year of experience in web development. This portfolio aims to showcase my professional journey, notable projects, and skills in web development and graphic design
projects_header: Here, you can see some of my personal projects and their respective case studies, showcasing the various technologies applied in each of them.
project1_description: My goal with this portfolio is to share my work and demonstrate how I can contribute to exciting projects. The first part took some time as I created a basic design in Figma. Once that initial phase was completed, the next step was to code it and implement features like translations and dark mode (still pending).
aboutme_paragraph1: I'm a Front-end Web developer who creates diverse applications by understanding the product and striving for its success. Take a look at some of my personal projects.
aboutme_paragraph2: I enjoy sharing the knowledge I've gained throughout my career as a developer, so I can assist people wherever I can. Feel free to reach out or connect with me on LinkedIn.
footerDescription: Connect with me on social media and discover more about my work, exploring the future of web development. Stay tuned for exciting projects ahead
